attributes.action: Provide Covid-19 testing kits for social care and nursing homes.
attributes.additional_details: My Dad is a resident in a nursing care home where there are now 7 residents who have some symptoms associated with Covid-19. They are having to provide Barrier insolation nursing for these patients, yet cannot confirm whether or not these are actual cases. They are being cared for in the home, rather than a hospital, but this level of care, clearly has huge implications for their staffing, particularly if they then also need to self-isolate.
attributes.background: Provide testing kits for social care and nursing homes so they can test for Covid-19. They can then make appropriate provisions, as well as protecting their staff and other residents. They are providing care for patients who would otherwise be dependent on the NHS and they need support to do this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304005.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
